pufferfish.catchTip: Fish for Pufferfish in the Ocean during Summer from 12:00 PM to 4:00 PM on Sunny days using a Steel Trap baited with Poppy Seeds.
pufferfish.profitNote: Pufferfish are moderately profitable, but consider catching more common fish like Bass or Catfish for higher volume sales.
pufferfish.bestUse: Optimal use: sell at the market for 200g each.

sturgeon.catchTip: Use a Worm or Fly at Mountain Lake between 6:00 AM and 7:00 PM during Summer or Winter for the best chance to catch a Sturgeon.
sturgeon.profitNote: Sturgeon is moderately profitable, selling for 200g each. Consider your time investment given its high difficulty level.
sturgeon.bestUse: Sell for profit; Sturgeon does not have any special uses in recipes or as gifts.

lava-eel.catchTip: Use a Fishing Rod and Worms at the Volcano Caldera during any season and time. The high difficulty requires precise timing and patience.
lava-eel.profitNote: Lava Eels are valuable but rare; consider their scarcity when planning your fishing trips compared to more common fish.
lava-eel.bestUse: Optimal use: Sell for profit or use in high-value recipes.

legend.catchTip: Use a Worm or Fly as bait during rainy days in Spring from 6:00 AM to 8:00 PM at Mountain Lake.
legend.profitNote: The Legend is highly valuable but requires high skill and specific conditions, making it worth the effort for profit if you can catch it consistently.
legend.bestUse: Sell directly to the Traveling Merchant for the highest price.

mutant-carp.catchTip: Use a Worm or Fly as bait. The Sewers can be slippery, so ensure your rod is well-balanced and ready to react quickly to bites.
mutant-carp.profitNote: Mutant Carp are valuable, but their high difficulty means they may not be the most profitable option compared to easier-to-catch fish.
mutant-carp.bestUse: Sell for a good profit or use in the Sewer Crawler recipe for a unique item.

octopus.bestUse: Optimal use is selling for profit, but you can also gift it to friends for relationship points.
